en.home.title: Welcome to Horticulture
en.home.description: Your trusted partner in horticulture. Discover our high-quality horticultural products and services designed to make your green projects thrive. With our expertise and focus on sustainability, we strive to achieve your horticultural goals.

en.auth/invalid-id-token: Oops! Invalid ID token. Please log in again.
en.auth/invalid-last-sign-in-time: Invalid last sign-in time. Try again.
en.auth/invalid-page-token: Invalid next page token. Check and try again.

en.auth/invalid-oauth-responsetype: Only one OAuth response type should be set to true.
en.auth/invalid-session-cookie-duration: Invalid session cookie duration. Try again.
en.auth/invalid-uid: Oops! Invalid user ID. Please check and try again.
en.auth/invalid-user-import: Invalid user record to import. Check and try again.
en.auth/maximum-user-count-exceeded: Oops! Maximum users exceeded for import.
en.auth/missing-android-pkg-name: Android Package Name missing. Provide it and try again.
en.auth/missing-continue-uri: Valid continue URL is required. Provide and try again.
en.auth/missing-hash-algorithm: Password hash import requires valid hashing algorithm.
en.auth/missing-ios-bundle-id: Bundle ID is missing. Provide and try again.
en.auth/missing-uid: User ID is required. Provide and try again.
en.auth/missing-oauth-client-secret: OAuth client secret required for OIDC code flow.

en.auth/project-not-found: Firebase project not found. Check your credentials.

en.auth/unauthorized-continue-uri: Invalid domain for continue URL. Whitelist in Firebase Console.
en.auth/user-not-found: Oops! No user found. Please check your information.
